column5: This programme is specifically designed to provide:Knowledge to enhance technical capabilities within the subject area.Understanding of how to innovate, generate and manage the creation of new ideas.In-depth knowledge of a certain domain of knowledge, that is related to engineering.Advanced research experience and skills that enable students to pursue a PhD programme.Conversion to PhD:Students of the Research Degree programme may convert to a PhD candidate if they satisfy all the criteria below:(a) Display excellent progress in their research.(b) Able to demonstrate the potential of their project to be expended to PhD level.(c) Pass a rigorous assessment.
